info.title: Environment sensor
info.description:
OpenBLE is swagger for Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), an API definition language for GATT services.

### Features

1. Connect and perfrom CRUD from the browser
2. Automatically validate your schema, just by connecting
3. Generate type safe clients and peripheral stubs
4. Version control your BLE APIs

### Links

- [Learn more](openble.org)
- [Contribute on GitHub](https://github.com/openble-org/openble)
- Investors: contact@openble.org

Support the future of wireless APIs by [staring OpenBLE on GitHub](https://github.com/openble-org)
